series_description: This series documents roadway additions, abandonments, discontinuances and renumbering. This series may include, but is not limited to: resolutions, forms, sketches, and correspondence.
retention_statement: 0 Years after superseded, obsolete, or rescinded

series_title: Automated Fuel System Module Code Worksheets
series_description: This series documents the authorization of users to pump gas into a state-owned vehicle, as well as the volume of fuel pumped. This series may include, but is not limited worksheets.
retention_statement: 0 Years after superseded, obsolete, or rescinded

series_description: This series documents the requests received either by a resolution submitted to the Virginia Transportation Board or by legislation passed by the General Assembly for the naming of a bridge or highway. This series may include, but is not limited to: resolutions, forms and correspondence.
This series documents daily river ferry boat crossing and any unusual incidents occurrences. This series may include, but is not limited to: forms and logs.

This series documents the authorization granted to VDOT by the United States Coast Guard to operate ferry boats on or near American waterways/coasts. This series may include, but is not limited to: reports, correspondence and forms.
This series documents the process of Automatic Tank Gauging (ATG) used to monitor possible fuel leaks. This series may include, but is not limited to: meter-reading tapes and manual stick readings
retention_statement: 1 Year after end of calendar year

series_description: This series documents the inspection of Division equipment. This series may include, but is not limited to: forms and checklists.

This series documents the entire history of interstates US routes in Virginia and any changes made to them. This series may include, but is not limited to: forms, resolutions, sketches, and applications.

This series documents the statistical data collected from sample sections of highways and entered into the Highway Performance Management System (HPMS). This series may include, but is not limited to, forms.
This series documents all road projects completed within Virginia and entered into the Roadway Inventory Management System (RIMS). This series may include, but is not limited to, forms.
retention_statement: 0 Years after no longer administratively useful

series_description: This series documents the monitoring and status of junkyard violations. This series may include, but is not limited to, correspondence and forms.
This series documents the existing and underconstruction road mileage within Virginia. This series include, but is not limited to: tabulations and forms.
This series documents the submission of the Pavement Data System Reporting Form (M-20) to residencies. This series may include, but is not limited to, forms.

This series documents the results of soil borings for potential impact on the extraction or installation of underground storage tanks (USTs). This series may include, but is not limited to: reports and forms.
retention_statement: 50 Years after end of calendar year

series_description: This series documents statewide radio dispatching/communications site installations and upgrades. This series may include, but is not limited to: correspondence and forms.
This series documents the Federal Communications Commission's licensing of all VDOT radio dispatch points of communication. This series may include, but is not limited to: licenses and correspondence

This series documents Equipment Shop safety meetings held daily to discuss possible safety hazards and ways to prevent them from occurring. This series may include, but is not limited to: agendas, attendance records and meeting minutes.
retention_statement: 1 Year after end of calendar year

series_title: Storage Tanks: Aboveground and Underground History
series_description: This series documents the monitoring of aboveground and underground storage tanks and dispensing equipment located on VDOT property during construction, upgrading, and ongoing maintenance to ensure compliance with U.S. EPA regulations. This series may include, but is not limited to: forms, correspondence and reports.
retention_statement: 3 Years after equipment, facility, or property sold or no longer in use

series_description: This series documents the assessment of road such as pavement distress and other road conditions that are used to rate highway conditions and initiate appropriate actions for repair or replacement. This series may include, but is not limited to, videotapes and video logs.
retention_statement: 0 Years after no longer administratively useful

series_description: This series documents the issuance of permits by the Department of Environmental Quality (DEQ) indicating VDOT's compliance with wastewater and other waste monitoring standards. This series may include, but is not limited to: permits, as-built plans and reports.
